statements: SELECT * FROM personalized_study_recommendations;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM personalized_study_recommendations WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT course_id, student_id, performance_score FROM personalized_study_recommendations WHERE student_id = 1001;
SELECT performance_score, learning_history FROM personalized_study_recommendations WHERE course_id = 2001;
SELECT * FROM personalized_study_recommendations ORDER BY student_id DESC, performance_score ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, learning_history, performance_score FROM personalized_study_recommendations WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY performance_score DESC, course_id ASC;
SELECT course_id, performance_score FROM personalized_study_recommendations WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(course_id) as total_courses FROM personalized_study_recommendations GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_courses >= 3;
SELECT student_id, AVG(performance_score) as average_score FROM personalized_study_recommendations GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_score DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT MAX(performance_score) as highest_score FROM personalized_study_recommendations WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT id, name, major FROM student WHERE major='Computer Science';
SELECT name, email FROM student WHERE id=1;
SELECT * FROM study_history WHERE status='completed';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM study_history ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM student WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT id, name, email FROM student WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT s.id, s.name, sh.course_id, sh.grade FROM student s JOIN study_history sh ON s.id = sh.student_id WHERE sh.status = 'completed' ORDER BY sh.grade DESC;
SELECT s.id, s.name, sh.course_id, sh.status, sh.grade FROM student s INNER JOIN study_history sh ON s.id = sh.student_id WHERE sh.grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_name, major FROM students
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses
SELECT student_name, major, GPA FROM students
SELECT course_name, department FROM courses
SELECT student_id, student_name, major, GPA FROM students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_name, instructor, department FROM courses WHERE department = 'Mathematics';
SELECT student_id, student_name, major, GPA FROM students ORDER BY GPA DESC;
SELECT * FROM study_recommendations WHERE student_id = 101 AND course_id = 201;

SELECT student_name, course_name, recommendation FROM students JOIN study_recommendations ON students.student_id = study_recommendations.student_id JOIN courses ON study_recommendations.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM student;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credits, instructor FROM course WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student.first_name, course.course_name, performance.grade FROM student INNER JOIN performance ON student.student_id = performance.student_id INNER JOIN course ON performance.course_id = course.course_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS enrollments FROM enrollment GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(enrollment_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM course WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student.first_name, course.course_name, enrollment.enrollment_date FROM student JOIN enrollment ON student.student_id = enrollment.student_id JOIN course ON enrollment.course_id = course.course_id WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY enrollment.enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT student.first_name, student.last_name, course.course_name, performance.grade FROM student JOIN performance ON student.student_id = performance.student_id JOIN course ON performance.course_id = course.course_id WHERE student_id = 2 AND credits >= 3 ORDER BY performance.grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT * FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT student_id, recommended_course_id, confidence_level FROM recommendations
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade > 90;
